name: DUELYST
blurb: Squad-Based Tactical Combat with Ranked Competitive Play. Brought to you by veterans from Diablo III and Rogue Legacy.

rewards.reward: SUPPORTER TIER ==============================\r\nThank you for your support! You have our deepest gratitude and we invite you to join the Duelyst Forums where you can discuss the game with the community and be identified as a Kickstarter Supporter.
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: GUARDIAN TIER ========================= Includes a digital download of the game and a set of 6 Hi-Res Backer-only wallpapers. All previous rewards included. Get it while it lasts!
GUARDIAN TIER ============================== Includes a digital download of the game and a set of 6 Hi-Res Backer-only wallpapers. All previous rewards included.

CHROMATIC TIER ============================== Includes specialized "Rogue" Alternate Faction Color Set for the Lyonar Kingdom and the "Cobra" Alternate Faction Color Set for the Songhai Empire. Plus a unique "Chromatic" Energy visual FX your opponents will see when hovering over your units and casting your spells. All previous rewards included.

ASSASSIN TIER ==============================\r\nBe the first to experience the game with Closed BETA Access. Help us improve the game by making it better, stronger, faster. With your help assassinating bugs, you'll be thanked by name in the CREDITS. All previous rewards included.

DIGITAL COLLECTOR ============================== Includes a digital DRM-free copy of the OST SOUNDTRACK composed by Ben MacDougall. Plus a DIGITAL ART BOOK that includes pixel sprite concepts, character concepts, environment concepts, game assets, story revelations, hidden in-game Easter eggs, and behind the scenes notes nicely wrapped into PDF format and sent your way. All previous rewards included.

PRISMATIC TIER ============================== Includes specialized Alternate Color Sets for every playable Faction to be seen by your opponents: Lyonar Kingdom, Songhai Empire, Vetruvian Empire, and Sharian Host. Plus a second set of Hi-Res wallpapers. All previous rewards included.

SECRET SQUAD TIER ============================== Includes the Kickstarter Exclusive "The Abyssian" set of battle units and Bloodborn General. This playable Faction 5 includes 7 unique classes each with their own distinct abilities (Guardian, Assassin, Chaser, Arcanyst, Justice, Sentinel, and General). PLUS another copy (key or download) of the game. All previous rewards included.

SECRET POWERS TIER ============================== Includes the Kickstarter Exclusive "Secret Powers", a set of 5 additional spells and 5 additional neutral mercenary minions. Includes "The Abyssian" playable Faction 5 with 7 unique classes. All previous rewards included.

RESPLENDANT PRINT TIER ============================== Includes a hand signed limited edition archival poster shipped directly to your location with a beautifully fashioned thank you note on the back. All previous rewards included.

SONGHAI GENERAL MINIATURE COLLECTOR ============================== Includes the Bloodborn General (Songhai Empire) 75mm Miniature Figurine created in high-definition acrylic resin. Numbered and personally signed by the artist. All previous rewards included.

SHARIAN GENERAL MINIATURE COLLECTOR  =================== Includes the Bloodborn General (Sharian Host) 75mm Miniature Figurine created in high-definition acrylic resin. Numbered and personally signed by the artist. All previous rewards included.

TWIN STRIKE MINIATURES COLLECTOR ============================== Includes BOTH Bloodborn General 75mm Miniature Figurines for the Songhai Empire and Sharian Host. Numbered and personally signed by the artist. All previous rewards included.

DUELYST TRAINER TIER ============================= Visit Counterplay Games' office in San Francisco where you will be one of the first to play an early build of Duelyst on-site! Give your feedback, thoughts, and rants directly to the development team over lunch. Additionally, we'll give you a tour of our underground product lab. Can't make it to San Francisco? Have a Skype or Google Hangout session with Duelyst Lead Keith Lee about the game or anything else on your mind. Your name will be permanently affixed to the "First Players" section of the Duelyst credits. (Transportation and lodging not provided). All previous rewards.

DEVELOPER TIER ============================== The Duelyst team will assist you in designing a fully playable Battle Unit with its own distinct abilities, pixel art, animations, and personality. On top of that, you'll get to sit in with the team at our underground product lab, have dinner with the developers, and receive an invitation to the internal developer launch party (transportation and accommodations not included). Receive both 75mm miniatures (Sharian Host and Songhai Empire) both signed and numbered. You will be named in the credits as Designer.

DESIGNER TIER ============================== Our team will assist you in developing a fully playable spell in the game from start to finish covering the gameplay design process, visual FX, pixel artwork, iconography, and the naming of the spell. Receive both 75mm miniatures (Sharian Host and Songhai Empire) both signed and numbered. You will be named in the credits as Designer.

BIG BOSS TIER ================ The Duelyst team will assist you in designing a fully playable BIG BOSS Legendary Battle Unit with its own distinct abilities, pixel art, animations, and personality. On top of that, you'll get to sit in with the team at our underground product lab, have dinner with the developers, and receive an invitation to the internal developer launch party (transportation and accommodations not included). Receive both 75mm miniatures (Sharian Host and Songhai Empire) both signed and numbered. You will be named in the credits as Designer.

GRAND DUELYST ============================== The entire Duelyst team will assist you in developing an ENTIRE FACTION in the game! This covers everything from concepts, abilities, pixel art, and animations.  You will assist with the Faction Crest and each individual unit class: Guardian, Assassin, Chaser, Arcanyst, Justice, Sentinel, and General. On top of that, you'll get to sit in with the team at our underground product lab, have dinner with the developers, and receive an invitation to the internal developer launch party (transportation and accommodations not included). Receive both 75mm miniatures (Sharian Host and Songhai Empire) both signed and both numbered as No. 1. You will be named in the credits as Producer.
